DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study establish amount drug absorb blood ingest combination dapagliflozin/metformin tablet vs. individual dapagliflozin tablet individual metformin tablet .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Amount Metformin After Taking Combination Tablet v . Separate Tablets
DOC.criteria: Female healthy volunteer must postmenopausal ( cessation menses > 1year ) , surgically sterile ( document ) hysterectomy abstinence Have normal physical exam , vital sign Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) finding , laboratory value Use prescription medication chronic acute medical condition within 3 week randomization History allergy metformin Previous participation AstraZeneca ( AZ ) BristolMyersSqibb dapagliflozin study
